Title: You Opened the Door
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Adam F. Goldberg (creator), Alex Barnow, Marc Firek, Kristopher Valentine (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Beverly chaperons the school dance when, she learns Adam and Dana are attending it together. Murray endures teaching Barry about the birds and the bees.
